zh-CN.description: 左右小轮均悬空，会导致里程严重偏差
zh-CN.mainTitle: 左右小轮均悬空，会导致里程严重偏差
zh-CN.subTitle: 请切换到「大轮模式」

en.description: Both left and right small wheels are suspended, which will cause a serious deviation in mileage.
en.mainTitle: Both left and right small wheels are suspended, which will cause a serious deviation in mileage.
en.subTitle: Please switch to 'Large Wheel Mode.

alerts.name: All encoder unavailable switch to big fusion

zh-CN.description: 自动模式中，因小轮均悬空，已内部切换为「大轮模式」
zh-CN.mainTitle: 自动模式中，因小轮均悬空，已内部切换为「大轮模式」

en.description: In automatic mode, due to the suspension of both small wheels, the system has internally switched to 'Large Wheel Mode'.
en.mainTitle: In automatic mode, due to the suspension of both small wheels, the system has internally switched to 'Large Wheel Mode'.

alerts.name: Encoder unavailable clear switch to small fusion

zh-CN.description: 自动模式中，小轮恢复正常，已内部切换为「小轮模式」
zh-CN.mainTitle: 自动模式中，小轮恢复正常，已内部切换为「小轮模式」

en.description: In automatic mode, the small wheels have returned to normal, and the system has internally switched back to 「Small Wheel Mode」.
en.mainTitle: In automatic mode, the small wheels have returned to normal, and the system has internally switched back to 「Small Wheel Mode」.

zh-CN.description: 主控MCU离线，无法控制机器
zh-CN.mainTitle: 主控MCU离线，无法控制机器
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次，可恢复则是软件故障；②不可恢复则是主控盒内硬件故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Main control MCU is offline and unable to control the machine.
en.mainTitle: Main control MCU is offline and unable to control the machine.
en.subTitle: 1.Power off and restart the system three times. If it recovers, it’s a software problem. 2.If not, it’s a hardware fault in the power, requiring professional repair or machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 主控主板温度偏高
zh-CN.subTitle: 请注意使用

en.description: Main control board is overheating.
en.mainTitle: Main control board is overheating.
en.subTitle: Please be cautious when using.

zh-CN.description: 主控主板温度过高
zh-CN.subTitle: 请注意使用

en.description: Main control board temperature is abnormally high.
en.mainTitle: Main control board temperature is abnormally high.
en.subTitle: Please be cautious when using.

zh-CN.description: 主控主板湿度偏高
zh-CN.subTitle: 请注意使用

en.mainTitle: The humidity of the main control board is too high.
en.subTitle: Please be cautious when using.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请注意使用

en.description: Main control board humidity is abnormally high.
en.mainTitle: Main control board humidity is abnormally high.
en.subTitle: Please be cautious when using.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请联系维修人员恢复到正常模式

en.description: The main control is not in the normal mode.
en.mainTitle: The main control is not in the normal mode.
en.subTitle: Please contact the maintenance personnel to restore to normal mode.

zh-CN.description: 主控温湿度传感器失效
zh-CN.mainTitle: 主控温湿度传感器失效
zh-CN.subTitle: 请注意使用

en.description: The main control temperature and humidity sensor is malfunctioning.
en.mainTitle: The main control temperature and humidity sensor is malfunctioning.
en.subTitle: Please be cautious when using.

zh-CN.description: 机架信息改变，请联系维修人员清除
zh-CN.subTitle: 请联系维修人员清除

en.description: Chassis data has changed; please contact maintenance personnel to clear.
en.mainTitle: Chassis data has changed.
en.subTitle: please contact maintenance personnel to clear.ID box is not available.RTC is not available.

en.mainTitle: RTC is not available.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请联系维修人员清除

en.description: Main control cover status remains uncleared
en.mainTitle: Main control cover status remains uncleared
en.subTitle: Please contact maintenance personnel to clear

zh-CN.description: 主控CPU使用率偏高

en.mainTitle: The CPU usage of the main control is too high.

en.mainTitle: The CPU usage of the main control is excessively high.

zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机异常故障，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: ①请断电重启3次;②重后如不可恢复则是电机硬件故障,需专业检修,并更换机器

en.description: Motor malfunction; unable to operate.
en.mainTitle: Motor malfunction; unable to operate.
en.subTitle: 1.Power off and restart the system three times. 2. If the problem is not fixed, it indicates a hardware fault with the motor. Professional repair is required, and the machine may need to be replaced.

zh-CN.description: 舵机离线，无法升降，请断电后检查「连接线」
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电后检查「连接线」；②重启后如不可恢复，需硬件工程师查看；③不影响任务可继续作业

en.description: Servo is offline and unable to lift or lower. Please power off and check the connections.
en.mainTitle: Servo is offline and unable to lift or lower.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and check the connections. 2. If the issue persists after restarting, a hardware engineer needs to inspect it. 3. Continue operations if the issue does not affect the task.

zh-CN.description: 舵机未校准
zh-CN.subTitle: 请联系维修人员重新校准

en.description: Servo is not calibrated.
en.mainTitle: Servo is not calibrated.
en.subTitle: Please contact maintenance personnel to recalibrate.

zh-CN.description: 舵机过载异常

en.mainTitle: Servo overload error.

en.mainTitle: Servo overcurrent error.

en.mainTitle: Servo overheating error.

en.mainTitle: Servo temperature is too high.

en.mainTitle: The servo target has not been reached.

zh-CN.subTitle: 解除禁足后方可继续行走

en.mainTitle: The servo motor cannot lift, operation has been prohibited.
en.subTitle: Operating can resume once the prohibition has been lifted.

zh-CN.description: 升降器行程变小，请检查结构或电机是否卡住

en.mainTitle: LED temperature and humidity sensor is abnormal.
en.subTitle: The temperature and humidity sensor is malfunctioning.

zh-CN.description: LED-NTC短路
zh-CN.subTitle: 温湿度失效

en.mainTitle: LED-NTC short circuit.LED-NTC open circuit.

en.mainTitle: The temperature of the LED beads is excessively high.

en.mainTitle: LED alert: The input voltage is too low

zh-CN.description: LED过压告警

en.description: LED alert: The input voltage is too high
en.mainTitle: LED alert: The input voltage is too high

en.description: LED lights have shut off due to overheat protection.
en.mainTitle: LED lights have shut off due to overheat protection.

zh-CN.description: 电机离线，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电后检查「连接线」；②重启不可恢疑似电机故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: The motor is offline, unable to operate.
en.mainTitle: The motor is offline, unable to operate.
en.subTitle: 1.Power off and and check the connection. 2. If the problem is not fixed, it is suspected to be a motor fault. Professional repair is required, and the machine may need to be replaced.

zh-CN.description: 电机配置错误，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机配置错误，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: 请返回维护人员设置

en.description: Motor config error，unable to move
en.mainTitle: Motor config error，unable to move
en.subTitle: Please return to the maintenance personnel for settings.

zh-CN.description: 电机初始化出错，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机初始化出错，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: 请返回维护人员设置

en.description: Motor initialization error, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor initialization error, unable to move.
en.subTitle: Please return to the maintenance personnel for settings.

zh-CN.description: 电机节点状态异常，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机节点状态异常，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: ①系统自恢复；②自恢复失败需人工断电重启3次；③依旧失败需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Motor node status error, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor node status error, unable to move.
en.subTitle: 1. The system will self-recover; 2. if self-recovery fails, manually power off and restart three times; 3. if it still fails, it is  uspected to be a motor fault, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 电机驱动器故障，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机驱动器故障，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: ①系统自恢复；②自恢复失败需人工断电重启3次；③依旧失败需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Motor driver error, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor driver error, unable to move.
en.subTitle: 1. The system will self-recover; 2. if self-recovery fails, manually power off and restart three times; 3. if it still fails, it is  uspected to be a motor fault, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 电机紧急错误，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机紧急错误，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: ①系统自恢复；②自恢复失败需人工断电重启3次；③依旧失败需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Motor emergency error, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor emergency error, unable to move.
en.subTitle: 1. The system will self-recover; 2. if self-recovery fails, manually power off and restart three times; 3. if it still fails, it is  uspected to be a motor fault, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 电机编码器未校准，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机编码器未校准，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: 请返回维护人员设置

en.description: Motor encoder is not calibrated, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor encoder is not calibrated, unable to move.
en.subTitle: Please return to the maintenance personnel for settings.

zh-CN.description: 电机编码器未校准/故障，无法转向
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机编码器未校准/故障，无法转向
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请检查并手动掰正「转向轮」；②还不行则为「出厂未校准」需产测介入

en.description: Motor encoder is not calibrated/faulty, unable to turn.
en.mainTitle: Motor encoder is not calibrated/faulty, unable to turn.
en.subTitle: 1. Check and manually reset the 'steering wheel'; 2. if it still doesn't work, it could be an 'out-of-factory calibration' issue that requires the involvement of the production measurement team.

zh-CN.description: 电机编码器发生紧急错误，无法转向
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机编码器发生紧急错误，无法转向
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是编码器故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Motor encoder emergency error, unable to turn.
en.mainTitle: Motor encoder emergency error, unable to turn.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a encoder fault, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 电机运动控制软件错误，无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电机运动控制软件错误，无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: 疑似软件不匹配/硬件版本更新，请返回维护人员检查

en.description: Motor motion control software error, unable to move.
en.mainTitle: Motor motion control software error, unable to move.
en.subTitle: Suspected software mismatch/hardware version update, please return to the maintenance personnel for inspection.

zh-CN.description: 电机电流偏高

en.description: Motor current is too high.
en.mainTitle: Motor current is too high.

zh-CN.description: 电机电流过高

en.description: Motor current is excessively high.
en.mainTitle: Motor current is excessively high.

zh-CN.description: 大轮异常，会导致里程偏差
zh-CN.mainTitle: 大轮异常，会导致里程偏差
zh-CN.subTitle: 请切换到「小轮模式」

en.mainTitle: Large wheel error, which will cause mileage deviation.
en.subTitle: Please switch to 「Small Wheel Mode」.

zh-CN.description: 小轮悬空

en.description: Small wheel is suspended.
en.mainTitle: Small wheel is suspended.

zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG离线，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电后检查「连接线」；②重启不可恢则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: FOG is offline, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG is offline, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and check the connection; 2. If it does not recover after restarting, it is suspected to be a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG自检错误，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG自检错误，无法对准/转换/定位

en.description: FOG self-check error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG self-check error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG通信异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG通信异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: FOG communication error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG communication error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG加速计异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG加速计异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: FOG accelerometer error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG accelerometer error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG陀螺仪异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG陀螺仪异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.mainTitle: FOG gyroscope error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG四元数异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG四元数异常，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: FOG quaternion error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG quaternion error, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: FOG超量程，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG超量程，无法对准/转换/定位
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启3次；②不可恢复则是FOG故障，需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: FOG value out of range, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.mainTitle: FOG value out of range, unable to align/convert/locate.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart three times; 2. If it is not recoverable, it is a FOG error, requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 深度传感器失效，无法定位
zh-CN.mainTitle: 深度传感器失效，无法定位
zh-CN.subTitle: 需专业检修，并更换机器

en.description: Depth sensor offline, unable to locate.
en.mainTitle: Depth sensor offline, unable to locate.
en.subTitle: Requiring professional maintenance and machine replacement.

zh-CN.description: 泵压传感器离线，无泵压数据
zh-CN.mainTitle: 泵压传感器离线，无泵压数据
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电后检查「连接线」；②重启不可恢疑似泵压传感器故障，需专业检修；③可看水泵机械表继续作业

en.description: Pump pressure sensor offline, no pump pressure data.
en.mainTitle: Pump pressure sensor offline, no pump pressure data.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and check the connection ; 2.If it does not recover after restarting, it is suspected to be a pump pressure sensor error, requiring professional maintenance; 3. You can continue to operate by looking at the mechanical gauge of the water pump.

zh-CN.description: 泵压传感器短路，无泵压数据
zh-CN.mainTitle: 泵压传感器短路，无泵压数据
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启1次；②重启不可恢疑似泵压传感器故障，需专业检修；③可看水泵机械表继续作业

en.description: Pump pressure sensor short circuit, no pump pressure data.
en.mainTitle: Pump pressure sensor short circuit, no pump pressure data.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart once ; 2.If it does not recover after restarting, it is suspected to be a pump pressure sensor error, requiring professional maintenance; 3. You can continue to operate by looking at the mechanical gauge of the water pump.

zh-CN.description: 泵压传感器超量程，无泵压数据
zh-CN.mainTitle: 泵压传感器超量程，无泵压数据
zh-CN.subTitle: ① 请断电重启1次；②重启不可恢疑似泵压传感器故障，需专业检修；③可看水泵机械表继续作业

en.description: Pump pressure sensor value out of range, no pump pressure data.
en.mainTitle: Pump pressure sensor value out of range, no pump pressure data.
en.subTitle: 1. Please power off and restart once ; 2.If it does not recover after restarting, it is suspected to be a pump pressure sensor error, requiring professional maintenance; 3. You can continue to operate by looking at the mechanical gauge of the water pump.

zh-CN.description: FOG盒离线，可能导致机器无法行走
zh-CN.mainTitle: FOG盒离线，可能导致机器无法行走
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检修

en.mainTitle: Compass temperature is excessively high.

en.mainTitle: Poor controller signal

zh-CN.description: 遥控器急停按键被按下
zh-CN.mainTitle: 遥控器急停按键被按下
zh-CN.subTitle: 请确认是否发生紧急事件，再旋转急停按键来解除急停按键

en.description: controller emergency stop button is pressed.
en.mainTitle: controller emergency stop button is pressed.
en.subTitle: Please confirm whether an emergency has occurred, then rotate the emergency stop button to release it.

zh-CN.description: 网关监控到MUC离线，影响遥控箱电源状态监控
zh-CN.mainTitle: 网关监控到MUC离线，影响遥控箱电源状态监控
zh-CN.subTitle: ①遥控箱体上的「系统指示灯」，如果不亮则需专业维修，并更换遥控箱；②如亮则开盖检查MCU和工控机连接网线，断电重启还不行则更换遥控箱

en.description: The gateway has detected that the MUC is offline, affecting the monitoring of the power status of the control center.
en.mainTitle: The gateway has detected that the MUC is offline, affecting the monitoring of the power status of the control center.
en.subTitle: ①If the「System Indicator Light」on the control center isn't on, professional maintenance is required, and the control center should be replaced; ②If it is on, then open the cover to check the network cable connection between the MCU and the industrial computer. If a power-off restart does not resolve the issue, then replace the control center.

zh-CN.description: 输入电源断电，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.mainTitle: 输入电源断电，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.subTitle: ①检查遥控箱空开；②检查发电机是否正常；③检查/更换「转电箱 - 连接线」链路

en.description: Input power outage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Input power outage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: 1. Please check the control center circuit breaker; 2. Check if the generator is normal; 3. Check and replace the 'power transfer box - connection line' link.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控输入电压偏高
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电源监控输入电压偏高
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查发电机状态是否异常

en.description: Power supply monitoring input voltage is too high.
en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring input voltage is too high.
en.subTitle: Please check if the generator status is abnormal.

zh-CN.description: 输入电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.mainTitle: 输入电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.subTitle: ①检查发电机电表是否正常；②检查/更换「转电箱 - 连接线」链路

en.description: Input voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Input voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: 1. Check if the generator is normal; 2. Check and replace the 'power transfer box - connection line' link.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控输入电压欠压
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电源监控输入电压电压
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查发电机状态是否异常

en.description: Power supply monitoring input voltage is too low.
en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring input voltage is too low.
en.subTitle: Please check if the generator status is abnormal.

zh-CN.description: 输出电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电，
zh-CN.mainTitle: 输出电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.subTitle: 需转研发检查「AC/DC电源输出电压配置」是否正确

en.description: Output voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Output voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: Please transfer to R&D for inspection to ensure the 'AC/DC power output voltage configuration' is correct.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控输出电压欠压
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电源监控输出电压欠压
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查AC/DC电源输出电压配置是否正确

en.description: Power supply monitoring output voltage is too low.
en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring output voltage is too low.
en.subTitle: Please check if the AC/DC power output voltage configuration is correct.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控输出电流过大
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电源监控输出电流过大
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查AC/DC电源输出电流配置是否正确或者机器人是否过载

en.description: Power supply monitoring output current is too high.
en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring output current is too high.
en.subTitle: Please check if the AC/DC power output current configuration is correct or if the robot is overloaded.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控枪头未插紧
zh-CN.subTitle: 请确认遥控箱状态正常后插入枪头，并确保枪头处于插紧状态

en.description: The power monitoring connector is not securely plugged in.
en.mainTitle: The power monitoring connector is not securely plugged in.

zh-CN.description: 疑似过流，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.mainTitle: 疑似过流，已自动断开机器人供电
zh-CN.subTitle: ①回收机器人，检查机器人和线缆连接处有无损坏；②拔掉线缆，并将接头置于安全区域后，仅给线缆通电；如依旧提示过流则线缆问题，需更换线缆；③未过流则需更换机器人

en.description: Suspected overcurrent, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Suspected overcurrent, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: ①Retrieve the robot and inspect the robot and cable connections for any damage; ②Unplug the cables and place the connectors in a safe area, then power only the cables; if there is still an overcurrent indication, the cables are at fault and need to be replaced; ③If there is no overcurrent, the robot needs to be replaced.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控急停按键被按下
zh-CN.mainTitle: 电源监控急停按键被按下

en.description: Suspected overcurrent, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Suspected overcurrent, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.

alerts.name: Output outage due to emergency stop button pressed

zh-CN.description: 「急停按键」按下，已自动断开机器人供电

zh-CN.subTitle: 重新供电请关闭「急停按键」

en.description: 'Emergency stop button' is pressed, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: 'Emergency stop button' is pressed, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: Please turn off the 'emergency stop button' to resume power supply.

alerts.name: Output outage due to input over voltage

zh-CN.description: 输入电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电

en.description: Input voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Input voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.

zh-CN.description: 输出电压过压，已自动断开机器人供电

zh-CN.subTitle: 需研发检修，并更换遥控箱

en.description: Output voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.mainTitle: Output voltage overvoltage, the robot power supply has been automatically disconnected.
en.subTitle: R&D needs to inspect and replace the control center.

en.mainTitle: Low battery of power supply monitoring UPS.
en.subTitle: Please turn on the input power switch to charge the battery.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控UPS发生故障，请检查
zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查UPS状态，确认是否需要更换UPS

en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring UPS has a fault.
en.subTitle: Please check the UPS status and confirm whether a UPS replacement is needed.

zh-CN.description: 电源监控UPS正在关机，请等UPS完全关机后才重新上电
zh-CN.subTitle: 请等UPS完全关机后才重新上电

en.subTitle: Please wait for the UPS to shut down completely before powering on again.

en.subTitle: Please check the AC/DC power status and confirm whether an AC/DC power replacement is needed.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查空调状态，确认是否需要更换空调

en.mainTitle: Power supply monitoring air conditioning has a fault.
en.subTitle: Please check the air conditioning status and confirm whether an air conditioning replacement is needed.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查机器人端PLC状态

en.subTitle: Please check the status of the PLC at the robot end.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查遥控箱端PLC状态

en.subTitle: Please check if there is any obstruction to the GPS module.

zh-CN.subTitle: 请检查路由器连接状态

en.mainTitle: controller has large message latency.

en.mainTitle: controller has large message interval.

en.mainTitle: High loss rate of controller packet.

en.subTitle: Please contact YYL immediately; the issue needs to be resolved urgently, otherwise, normal operations cannot proceed.
